q2.question: Who goes on a journey of discovery?
q2.recall: Anyone can go on a journey of discovery. It is not limited to a specific group of people or individuals. People from all walks of life, different ages, backgrounds, and cultures can embark on a journey of self-discovery, exploration, or learning. It can be a personal journey to understand oneself better, a quest for knowledge and understanding, or an adventure to explore new places, ideas, or experiences. Ultimately, anyone who seeks growth, knowledge, or a deeper understanding of themselves or the world around them can go on a journey of discovery.
q2.vectordb: It is unclear who goes on a journey of discovery based on the given information.
q2.hybrid: It is unclear who goes on a journey of discovery based on the given information.
